Harrison St.  Are you hungry and looking for a nice restaurant to enjoy good cuisine? Whether you are looking to dine-in or something on the go, the Student Centers has several options for you to choose from. We also offer catering for special events, or just because.       Cruising Café      Designed to meet the nutritional needs and the environmental expectations of University students, faculty, staff and visitors.  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 8:00am – 3:30pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/29/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours 3/30/20        Fooda      Fooda presents a rotation of local restaurants to popup in the Student Services Building. Enjoy local eateries without having to leave campus. Fooda is a cashless pop-up food option that uses the Fooda app for purchases. To find the menu and download the app please visit http://www.fooda.com/ssbeastatrium . Click the calendar on the top left of the page for the menu for each day of the week. Come visit Fooda at the first floor east atrium of SSB.  Designed to meet the nutritional needs and the environmental expectations of University students, faculty, staff and visitors.  Regular Hours   Monday-Friday 11:00am – 1:30pm  Saturday & Sunday Closed  Spring Break Hours  3/16/20 – 3/20/20 Monday – Friday 11:00am – 1:30pm  3/23/20 – 3/29/20 Closed  Resume Regular Hours 3/30/20           Dining           Student Center East    Student Center West    Student Services Building    Alternate Campus Dining
